articles.description: In an exclusive interview with Times Now Digital, World champion PV Sindhu spoke at length about her 'I RETIRE’ post, intense rivalry with Saina Nehwal and her quest for the Olympic gold in the Tokyo Olympics.
articles.content:
• In a chat exclusively to Times Now, World champion PV Sindhu spoke at length about her 'I RETIRE post
  • Sindhu also opened up about her intense rivalry with Saina Nehwal
